body_html:
It seams odd to me, that going forward, there will be like tf.nn.foo_v2 but no tf.nn.foo...
I suppose this is a matter of compatibility, but since (according to the message) this will take effect in the next major release, why can't we keep the name?
body_text:
It seams odd to me, that going forward, there will be like tf.nn.foo_v2 but no tf.nn.foo...
I suppose this is a matter of compatibility, but since (according to the message) this will take effect in the next major release, why can't we keep the name?
body:
It seams odd to me, that going forward, there will be like `tf.nn.foo_v2` but no `tf.nn.foo`...
I suppose this is a matter of compatibility, but since (according to the message) this will take effect in the next *major* release, why can't we keep the name?
